item.title: 🚀 Want to see where Katana is heading? Join our 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁 𝗿𝗼𝗮𝗱𝗺𝗮𝗽 𝘄𝗲𝗯𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗿. 🗓️ 𝗔𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗹 𝟵
item.description:
🚀 Want to see where Katana is heading? Join our 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁 𝗿𝗼𝗮𝗱𝗺𝗮𝗽 𝘄𝗲𝗯𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗿. 🗓️ 𝗔𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗹 𝟵 | 𝟭𝟭:𝟬𝟬 𝗔𝗠 𝗘𝗦𝗧 Learn what’s new, what’s next — and how you can be part of it.
Whether you're a Katana user, partner, or just curious about where we're headed, this exclusive webinar is your front-row seat to everything coming up in 2025.
The session will be hosted by Shawn Coultice, Head of Channel Partnerships, Jeppe Grue, CPO, and Rui Daniel P., Senior Product Manager, who will cover: ✨ Key product releases from the last 6 months 🔧 New features in the pipeline 🔌 New integrations and ecosystem growth 🗣️ How you can help shape the future of Katana
👉 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲: https://hubs.li/Q03dFD8q0
👉 [Read on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7311020721357361152)

item.title: Have you already tried out Katana's native #HubSpot integration?⚡ 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗞𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗮 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗛𝘂𝗯𝗦𝗽𝗼𝘁 𝗲𝗻𝗮...
item.description:
Have you already tried out Katana's native #HubSpot integration?⚡
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗞𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗮 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗛𝘂𝗯𝗦𝗽𝗼𝘁 𝗲𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝘁𝗼: 🔁 Automatically import sales orders from won deals ✅ Use triggers to keep order fulfillment and production in sync 📊 Make better decisions with accurate, real-time inventory and production data
Get a shared source of truth between your sales and operations teams, and streamline your entire order-to-delivery process.
🔗 𝗟𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲: https://hubs.li/Q03dtBW90
👉 [Read on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7310662002480181248)

item.title: 🚨 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗱𝗿𝗼𝗽: Our product team has been hard at work and just released another highly-requested feature
item.description:
🚨 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗱𝗿𝗼𝗽: Our product team has been hard at work and just released another highly-requested feature — 𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲𝘀! 🙌
From installation and repairs to subscriptions and custom work, many businesses offer services alongside physical products. But most inventory systems aren’t built for that — until now.
𝗪𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗰𝗮𝗻: ✅ Add services directly to sales orders ✅ Track product and service revenue in one place ✅ Sync everything with HubSpot for smoother sales and fulfillment ✅ Get clear, accurate financial reporting across all revenue streams
Whether you’re offering tailoring, training, warranties, or white-label packaging — you can now sell it all in one seamless workflow.
💡 No more hacks or disconnected tools. Just one place to manage everything you sell.
𝗡𝗼𝘄 𝗮𝘃𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝘀. Read the full article here: 🔗 https://hubs.li/Q03dhRBK0
👉 [Read on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7310295645456666625)

item.title: From sales to production, seamlessly with Katana and HubSpot. Want to know how? 👉 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲 ...
item.description:
From sales to production, seamlessly with Katana and HubSpot. Want to know how? 👉 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘄𝗲𝗯𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗿: https://hubs.li/Q03d4mg00
Save your seat to catch a live walkthrough of our new HubSpot integration already this 𝗧𝗵𝘂𝗿𝘀𝗱𝗮𝘆 — and see how it helps manufacturers connect their CRM with production in just a few clicks.
The webinar will be hosted by Shawn Coultice, Head of Channel Partnerships at Katana Cloud Inventory, and David Singletary, a seasoned software implementation expert and CEO of DJS DIGITAL LLC, who’s helped countless businesses bring their systems together.
Whether you're already using HubSpot or just curious, this session will show you what’s possible.
#HubSpotIntegration #ManufacturingWorkflow #SalesToProduction #Webinar
👉 [Read on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7309936699571146753)

item.title: 🎉This week, the Katana office transformed into a full-blown Latin fiesta! 🌮 With our very own self-taught DJs bringing the heat ...
item.description:
🎉This week, the Katana office transformed into a full-blown Latin fiesta! 🌮 With our very own self-taught DJs bringing the heat with an epic mix of Latin beats, the energy was off the charts! 💃🕺
This event, led by our talented Katanauts, was all about coming together — dancing, mingling, and soaking up the good vibes. From tacos to tunes, it was a night to remember!
👉 [Read on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7308848320922226688)
